step.datasource: SELECT CAST(ISNULL(t.OrgRegel, '') AS VARCHAR(160)), os.id, ok.ordernr as headerid FROM dbo.orkrg ok WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN TIEExact.dbo.DAF_orderregels t WITH (NOLOCK) ON ok.docnumber = t.docnumber INNER JOIN dbo.orsrg os WITH (NOLOCK) ON t.regel = os.regel AND ok.ordernr = os.ordernr AND LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(ISNULL(t.OrgRegel, '') AS varchar(160)))) <> LTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(os.instruction, ''))) where ok.debnr = '040447'

SELECT '0' as fakt_code, '800' as kstplcode, ok.ordernr, ok.ordernr as headerid FROM dbo.orkrg ok WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN TIEExact.dbo.DAF_orderregels t WITH (NOLOCK) ON ok.docnumber = t.docnumber WHERE 1=1 AND ok.debnr = '040447' AND (LTRIM(RTRIM(fakt_code)) <> '0' OR LTRIM(RTRIM(kstplcode)) <> '800')

SELECT 100 as korting, 0 as prijs_n, os.id, ok.ordernr as headerid FROM dbo.orkrg ok WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN TIEExact.dbo.DAF_orderregels t WITH (NOLOCK) ON ok.docnumber = t.docnumber INNER JOIN dbo.orsrg os WITH (NOLOCK) ON ok.ordernr = os.ordernr INNER JOIN SDKsrg ss WITH (NOLOCK) ON os.sysguid = ss.linkid WHERE 1=1 AND ok.debnr = '040447' AND os.esr_aantal <> os.aant_gelev AND os.prijs_n <> 0 AND ss.TextDescription LIKE '%********************%'
